entries.journal_entry_description: More leads on the missing pilot is surfacing but what was the pilot up to and why is everyone looking for him?
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The missing pilot was talking to a information broker called Wire a few days before he was shot down. Talk to Wire and find out what he knows. You can find him in the Dearic cantina on Talus.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Wire has pointed you to one of the people that wanted the pilot dead. He's a Trandoshan slavemaster of the Blackscale clan, residing in the city of Keren on Naboo. You may want to bring some friends along for this one.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Try to find some clues to what the Trandoshans know about the missing pilot.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You've found a Wookiee inside the Trandoshan building.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: The Trandoshan slavemaster is dead. Maybe the Wookiee Arrworr have some knowledge about the missing pilot.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Help Arrworr escape the slaver's building.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Talk to Arrworr and find out what he knows about the missing pilot.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Return to your Imperial contact in the Bestine cantina and inform him of what has happened.
